vooga.towerdefense.model.shop

Class ShopItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.Rectangle
          • vooga.towerdefense.model.shop.ShopItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class ShopItem
extends java.awt.Rectangle
    ShopItem is a class used to display purchasable items in the view. It has a sprite and a factory corresponding to what item it is.
    Author:
    Erick Gonzalez, Leonard Ng'ono, JLongley
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
